Event List

{{event.name}}

import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { RepositoryService } from 'app/repository-service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-event', templateUrl: './event.component.html', styleUrls: ['./event.component.css'] }) export class EventComponent { constructor(private repositoryService: RepositoryService) { } eventsList: any; ngOnInit(): void { this.repositoryService.getEvents().subscribe( (response) => {this.eventsList = response; }); } }
